      • getSchedulerJars

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSchedulerJars(java.lang.String directory)
        Given a directory, get the list of scheduler jars. A jar belongs to scheduler, if it has the either the pattern "heron-scheduler*.jar" or "heron-*-scheduler*.jar"
        Parameters:
        directory - the directory to search
        Returns:
        list of scheduler jars

        Returns:
        class of scheduler jars

      • getMetricsManagerJars

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getMetricsManagerJars(java.lang.String directory)
        Given a directory, get the list of metricsmgr jars. A jar belongs to metrics, if it has the either the pattern "heron-metricsmgr*.jar" or "heron-*-metricsmgr*.jar"
        Parameters:
        directory - the directory to search
        Returns:
        list of metrics manager jars

        Returns:
